content:
As we've done for the past couple of WGMs, the Monday lunchtime FHIR Management Group meeting will be used to host an open session for FHIR committers. Grab your lunch, then come to Annapolis. Topics to be covered are:

  • The move to Git - questions/concerns/plans
  • Dynamic behavior in IGs
  • IG development questions and future plans
  • Other?

The session is intended for those who have (or expect to soon need) committer privileges to work on updating FHIR resources and/or implementation guide content.
is anyone from IHE in that meeting? i have a few questions for IG development questions and plans. should I post them here?
(or am i too late for this round?)

@Lloyd McKenzie Question: can we fork the DaVinci IG template for that (there is no licensing information on github repo)? I think @Grahame Grieve was going to do something there so we can wait - or help, which is better.
At the Mon lunch, I thought there was mention of a possible committers breakfast (to demo the new process). Is that today? If so, where?
hmm I forgot about this - looks like I wasn't the only one :-(
should we do this at the facilitators round table at 5:15pm tonight?
Sounds great - Michelle, would you be willing to capture notes?
I will do this in Constellation D at 5:10pm
I will demonstrate a typical process - I have a typo to fix as a demonstration
